Awesome movie!!!! Very funny... very entertaining... no lull time in the story. Love it!!! A few sad moments.
I thought the movie was epic also I went in quite aware that this was part 1 two-part series
great show great effects funny full.of action and some good twist t

I enjoyed this movie although I was a little disappointed in the WOW factor. I expected more shocks and surprises. loved the team ups. I enjoyed how deep a character Thanos became. he's not a paper villain. my fave characters were Scarlet Witch, the Hulk and Thor. didn't understand the move by Doctor Strange and also a fake out death. I thought there'd more shocking and sad moments. with this being a two parter, I was naturally not satisfied with the ending and potential cliffhangers. I'll be seeing again at least twice to see if my feelings change or if I find something I missed. don't know if was my theater or the movie but a few times, I couldn't understand the dialogue. I'm also old lol. I think this was spoiler free. go see it. at least twice
Shocking and thrilling with great story telling. It was one of the darkest if not the darkest Marvel movie ever made. Canâ€™t wait to see it again!
Great movie. I just wish the next Avengers came out out sooner!
Outstanding.. great story, fun crossovers, amazing effects and a real sense of peril... plus the bad  guys were all wicked. So much fun, I saw it twice already and look forward to a third viewing.

It far surpasses the previous superhero group up, Civil War, despite running into many of the same issues. The Marvel formula consists of drastic changes of tone on the flip of a dime, which is just as present as ever in this film, but is countered by an incredibly interesting and terrifying villain, unlike hardly any other Marvel film. That fact by itself makes it a huge step up in comparison to the previous, but that combined with the incredible scope of nearly every character in the MCU being present and handled appropriately and entertainingly, makes this movie a wonderful experience. It's the best Marvel has put out there since Iron Man 3.
